select * from approvalForm where aform_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by AFORM_TITLE

insert into approvalDoc (ADOC_NO, AFORM_NO, ADOC_WRITERNO, ADOC_UPLOADDATE, ADOC_SECURITY, ADOC_EXPIRATION, ADOC_SUBJECT, ADOC_CONTENT, adoc_status) values (seq_apdoc.nextval, #{aform_no}, #{adoc_writerno}, DEFAULT, #{adoc_security}, #{adoc_expiration}, #{adoc_subject},#{adoc_content},DEFAULT)
SELECT SEQ_apdoc.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM APPROVALDOC FORM WHERE adoc_no=#{adoc_no}
select st.*,emp_name,emp_signature,job_title from approvalStatus st, employee e, job j where st.adoc_no=#{adoc_no} and st.emp_no=e.emp_no and e.job_code=j.job_code
select doc.*,form.aform_title from approvalDoc doc, approvalForm form where doc.aform_no=form.aform_no and adoc_status=0 and adoc_writerno=#{emp_no} order by adoc_no desc
select doc.*,form.aform_title from approvalDoc doc, approvalForm form where doc.aform_no=form.aform_no and adoc_status^=0 and adoc_writerno=#{emp_no} order by adoc_no desc

SELECT DOC.*, EMP_NAME WRITERNAME, form.aform_title FROM APPROVALDOC DOC, approvalForm form, APPROVALSTATUS ST, EMPLOYEE EMP WHERE doc.aform_no=form.aform_no and DOC.ADOC_NO = ST.ADOC_NO AND ST.EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND ST.AS_STATUS = 0 and doc.adoc_status = 0 AND DOC.ADOC_WRITERNO = EMP.EMP_NO ORDER BY DOC.ADOC_NO DESC

SELECT DOC.*, EMP_NAME WRITERNAME, form.aform_title FROM APPROVALDOC DOC, approvalForm form, APPROVALSTATUS ST, EMPLOYEE EMP WHERE doc.aform_no=form.aform_no and DOC.ADOC_NO = ST.ADOC_NO AND ST.EMP_NO = #{emp_no} AND ST.AS_STATUS ^= 0 AND DOC.ADOC_WRITERNO = EMP.EMP_NO ORDER BY DOC.ADOC_NO DESC
